para.text: When exporting the model input files, ModelMuse creates two separate batch files to run the model. One of them is named RunModel.bat and will be used by PEST to run the model. The other will be named RunModflow.bat or RunSutra.bat. The latter batch files must be run once before starting PEST. The RunModflow.bat or RunSutra.bat will contain an run a utility program to create an instruction file for PEST. They may also have instructions to run PLPROC scripts that will calculate kriging factors. The RunModel.bat file will contain an run a utility program to extract simulated values in the format specified in the instruction file. The RunModel.bat may also perform kriging interpolation among pilot points using the kriging factors generated with the RunModflow.bat or RunSutra.bat files.
